F

Fireball - Class in gremlins

Constructor for fireball
fireballHit(App) - Method in class gremlins.Fireball
FireballHit is a method that evaluates whether the 'current' fireball considered has hit a valid destructable block on the map
fireballHitGremlin(App) - Method in class gremlins.Fireball
FireballHitGremlin is a method that evaluates whether the 'current' fireball considered has hit a gremlin mobile entity on the screen
fireballMechanics(App) - Method in class gremlins.Wizard
FireballMechanics controls all the interactions between fireballs, and all other objects in the game This method is located in the wizard as every fireball within its available fireballs ArrayList must be updated.

Gremlin - Class in gremlins

Respawn method, that allows the gremlin to respawn on the map on an open block at least 10 blocks away from the wizard

shoot() - Method in class gremlins.Wizard
Shoot method creates a new fireball, adds it to the exisitng list of fireballs, then takes the newest one (indicated by the fact that it is the last one in the ArrayList) and moves it in the direction that the wizard is facing.
shootSlimeBall() - Method in class gremlins.Gremlin
Method that "shoots" a slimeball by creating a new slimeball object, and sending it in a direction (after adding it to the current gremlin's available slimeballs ArrayList attribute)

SlimeBall - Class in gremlins
SlimeBall Class: The Slime's projectiles that extends a projectile (originates from mobile entity)

Constructor for SlimeBall
slimeballMechanics(App) - Method in class gremlins.Gremlin
Slimeball mechanics dictates all the behaviour a slimeball should express This is featured in the gremlin class as each gremlin has a set of fireballs, which makes it easier to control and modify then if it were in the slimeball class.

stuffUI(App) - Static method in class gremlins.Kamehameha
This static method is used regardless of whether a kamehameha object exists, as it points to no object This is used to dosplay the instructions and the charges of Kamehameha beams left for the user to see.

Tick method "updates" the fireball everytime called.
tick(App) - Method in class gremlins.Gremlin
Tick method updates the gremlin object each game tick.
tick(App) - Method in class gremlins.Kamehameha
The Tick method searches the current row or column the wizard is in (depending on which way the kamehameha beam was fired) and gathers all possible blocks in that row or column.
tick(App) - Method in class gremlins.Mobile
 
tick(App) - Method in class gremlins.SlimeBall
Overriden Tick method that detects if the slimeball is both not frozen (powerup is not active) and if it hasn't hit any entities.
tick(App) - Method in class gremlins.Wizard
Tick method for the wizard hosts all the logic to deal with fireball firing, entity collision and interactions, valid and invalid motion/movements, and wizard death.
tp(App) - Method in class gremlins.Wizard
Teleport method that resets the wizard's current coordinates to new coordinates generated by the random generator.
